LanguageData.LF_Apparel_GhostCloak.label: ghost cloak
LanguageData.LF_Apparel_GhostCloak.description: It is a ghostly cloth used in a festival celebrating the autumn harvest. Supposedly, such cloaks are meant to drive out evil spirits when worn on the day of Samhain, which is said to open the gate connecting the spirit world to this one. Oddly enough, nudists don't seem to mind wearing this.
